title: "Council to use AI to catch speeding motorists"
excerpt: "A council is to use artificial intelligence (AI) to catch speeding motorists, new policy papers have revealed. Kent County Council says it will also aim to use the technology to find crumbling roads and identify residents who may be vulnerable to homelessness."
